patthana16.87:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
patthana16.87:1.1_0: Improperly explained the teaching of equanimity.
patthana16.87:1.1_1: equanimity doesn’t give rise to equanimity. ...
patthana16.87:1.1_2: I don’t arise because of equanimity.
patthana16.87:2.1_0: I don’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
